Name: Boxcar
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of sugar rim & orange zest twist (expressed & then discarded).
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: A White Lady in a sugar-rimmed glass with the addition of a dash of grenadine and substituting lime juice for lemon.
Nutrition: One serving of Boxcar contains 167 calories
